article_title: Why are Hispanic Catholics so concerned about climate change?
article_text: Spiritual Politics is sponsored by the Leonard E. Greenberg Center for the Study of Religion in Public Life at Trinity College. Its initiatives are designed to foster discussion of religion in public life both within the campus community and among various external publics.

og.description: Another reason for Republicans to oppose immigration reform.

article_summary:
Spiritual Politics is sponsored by the Leonard E. Greenberg Center for the Study of Religion in Public Life at Trinity College.
Its initiatives are designed to foster discussion of religion in public life both within the campus community and among various external publics.
